thread.title: BRIEF-Brookfield Renewable Partners Reports Qtrly FFO Per Unit Of $0.46

title: BRIEF-Brookfield Renewable Partners Reports Qtrly FFO Per Unit Of $0.46

organizations.name: brief-brookfield renewable partners reports qtrly ffo per unit

text:
54 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Brookfield Renewable Partners Reports Qtrly FFO Per Unit Of $0.46 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Brookfield Renewable Partners Lp : 
* BROOKFIELD RENEWABLE ANNOUNCES 2017 RESULTS AND 5% DISTRIBUTION INCREASE 
* BROOKFIELD RENEWABLE PARTNERS LP QTRLY FFO PER UNIT $0.46 
* BROOKFIELD RENEWABLE PARTNERS LP - APPOINTMENT OF WYATT HARTLEY AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER 
* BROOKFIELD RENEWABLE PARTNERS LP - HARTLEY SUCCEEDS NICHOLAS GOODMAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
